Our Food

The Kingstide’s menu showcases a variety of seafood dishes thoughtfully prepared in both raw and wood-fired styles. Ingredients are sourced from trusted local partners and purveyors, reflecting the best of the Lowcountry’s coastal waters and farms. Designed as a gathering place for Daniel Island and the surrounding community, The Kingstide offers a welcoming space to connect, celebrate, and enjoy the flavors of the region.
